mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_COMMUATTACH (COMMUUUID, COMMUUPLOADPATH, COMMUFILENAME, COMMUIMAGE, COMMUBNO) VALUES (#{commuUuid}, #{commuUploadPath}, #{commuFileName}, #{commuImage}, #{commuBno})
mapper.select: SELECT COMMUUUID, COMMUUPLOADPATH, COMMUFILENAME, COMMUIMAGE, COMMUBNO FROM TBL_COMMUATTACH WHERE COMMUUPLOADPATH = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
